name: Automa Chrome GUI Environment
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'set -e && if [ ! -d /workspace/automa ]; then echo "Cloning Automa..." && git clone https://github.com/AutomaApp/automa.git /workspace/automa; fi && echo "Installing pnpm globally..." && npm install -g pnpm && cd /workspace/automa && echo "Installing Automa dependencies..." && pnpm install && echo "Creating getPassKey.js..." && echo "export default function() { return \"anything-you-want\"; };" > src/utils/getPassKey.js && echo "Building Automa..." && pnpm build && echo "Installing Python packages..." && python3 -m pip install pymongo python-dotenv requests websocket-client pandas openpyxl && echo "Setting up workspace npm..." && cd /workspace && npm init -y && npm install dexie dexie-export-import puppeteer fs-extra && echo "Setup completed successfully!"'
